lokaye pawathina wruththin athara dewa yana gaurawaniya namayen gaurawadarayata pathra wana ekama pirisa gurubhawathun we.sigalowada suthrayedi budunwahanse “aachariya dakkhina disa” kiyala dakunu dishawa handunwuye aacharyawarun udesayi.nana,guna,bala,suwa sapiri, guru degurunata saha mawbimata aadaraya karana ha wishwayata sampathak wana yahapath daksha nirmanathmaka purawasiyan pirisak bihi kirima magin shashri lankeya manawa sampatha sanwardhanaya karalima udesa merata guru dewiwarun sidukala parithyagaya athimahathya.adhyapanaye gunathmakabhawaya nanwalima udesa mahinda rajapaksha rajaya shri lankeya guruwarun diriganwima sandaha sidukala karyayan rashiyak we.lokaye ratawalin thunen ekakata sitina guruwarungen puhunuwa laba denne siyayata 75 kata pamanak bawa goliya niyamana warthawa penwa de.eheth ema thaththwayen wana anisi balapama manawa watahagath janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wasara 2005n pasu bandawa gath upadhidhari guruwarun sankhyawa 60,000k pamana we. 2014 wasara sandaha guruwarun 5000k pamana bandawa ganimata awashya pimbaurupath adhyapana amathyanshaya wisin sakas karamin pawathi.shri lankika guruwarun udesa gaurawaniya thaththwayak, piliganimak athikaralimata rajapaksha rajaya wasarin wasara kriyathmaka wiya.
ewita obata onna kandem menna kandem ganata thibena wahana eeye pradakshan layin eken eliyata aa milakata miladigatha haka.

wideshiya thanapathiwarun hamuwe chanal fo widiyo chithrapataya thiragatha karamin shri lanka hamudawa yuda aparadhakaruwan kirima sandaha hiyuman rayits woch, amanesti intarnashanal saha krayim grup soseyiti namathi en.ji.oo. sanwidhana saha eki chithrapataya nirmanaya kala adhyaksha kallam makre pereda (21 da) dahawal niwyorkhi dewasthana madhyasthanaye di daru uthsahaya mejar janaral shawendra silwa wisin wyartha kara atha.mema sawadya widiyo chithrapataya thiragatha wi prashna asana awasthawe janaralwaraya en.ji.oo. kriyakaringe awahiratha nothaka shalawata awathirna wi thibe.
